channel.title: How do you actually play mopar?
channel.description: I like just started and i dont know how to like play the game on a non-hybrid server. and when i go on website its just a grey thing :(

item.title: How do you actually play mopar?
item.dc:creator: @s4nta s4nta
item.description:
@s4nta wrote:

Mmk, so you’ve downloaded the latest java? that’s what you have to do in order for it to work. So download jdk 6. Google it if you wish, as I can’t give you site name, cheers.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you actually play mopar?
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

Download it, or update your java…

Go into the server advertisement center, click a server advertisment topic. After you have done this look for the ip. Then type in ANY username and password and then type in the ip that they told you about. Then log in and play almost like normal rs exept a bit different
